message: Bob, I'm offering you my product at a price of $900,000. It's a fantastic deal, considering the value it holds. Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $750,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $850,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let's find a compromise.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to go up to $825,000. Can you meet me at that price?
